channel.title: David Bowie died and I envy his life a whole lot
channel.description: *gif made from [a random tweet](https://twitter.com/lachlan/status/686536679247753218).* https://twitter.com/cauerego/status/686522625850535936 That triggered me to do some [wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Bowie) reading, all on the mobile. IMHO, he was luckily born in an easy place to live, enjoyed financial freedom for ever, plus quickly figured out what sex and religion is all about in his heart - i.e. he wasn't tainted by all his freedom and did manage to set his mind in the right place - unlike most people especially in famous positions as his. Dying 2 days after being 69 on top of it all? Such a meaningful number with the most common cause of death in the recent days? If I were living his life and had to choose a time and place to die, I couldn't do any better. :D https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ViftZTfRSt8&list=RDViftZTfRSt8#t=0 (youtube link first posted on [the daily wtf](https://what.thedailywtf.com/t/song-of-the-day/3786/2141?u=cregox))

item.title: David Bowie died and I envy his life a whole lot
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:


gif made from a random tweet.

twitter.com

Caue C M Rego (cauerego)

Sad? Only knew him from labyrinth. He had a legen insanely fulfilling life, died in a dary age. To me it's envy. :) twitter.com/elonmusk/statuâ€¦
10:18 AM - 11 Jan 2016

That triggered me to do some wikipedia reading, all on the mobile. IMHO, he was luckily born in an easy place to live, enjoyed financial freedom for ever, plus quickly figured out what sex and religion is all about in his heart - i.e. he wasn't tainted by all his freedom and did manage to set his mind in the right place - unlike most people especially in famous positions as his.

Dying 2 days after being 69 on top of it all? Such a meaningful number with the most common cause of death in the recent days? If I were living his life and had to choose a time and place to die, I couldn't do any better.


(youtube link first posted on the daily wtf)

Read full topic
item.source: David Bowie died and I envy his life a whole lot
